title: If  Science could double your size would you do it?
body:
https://d3b4yo2b5lbfy.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/wallpapers/GuildWars2-07-1920x1080.jpg

Height/length would be doubled
Strenght would be increased by a lott
making you a giant basically 

Would you do it?
_The only price to pay would be nothing because robot camera's
Would monitor you every day for some time for SCIENCE!! _

Basically you would turn into a [Norn ](https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/Norn)mehehehehe
